com.ibm.avatar.api.exceptions

Class TextAnalyticsException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.ibm.avatar.api.exceptions.TextAnalyticsException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbiguousPathRefException, ChunkerException, CircularDependencyException, CompilerException, DependencyResolutionException, DocReaderException, DocSchemaMismatchException, FunctionCallInitializationException, FunctionCallValidationException, IncompatibleCompiledDictException, IncompatibleTokenizerConfigException, InvalidDictionaryFileFormatException, InvalidModuleElementException, InvalidOutputNameException, InvalidTableEntryException, InvalidTokenizerConfigException, ModuleLoadException, ModuleMatchException, NoSuchModuleLoadedException, TableUDFException, UnrecognizedFileFormatException, URIToFileException, VerboseNullPointerException

    public class TextAnalyticsException
extends Exception
    A generic exception class to signal errors while invoking Text Analytics API.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • convertToTextAnalyticsException

        public static TextAnalyticsException convertToTextAnalyticsException(Throwable cause,
                                                                     TextAnalyticsException.ExceptionType errorType)
        This method converts the specified unchecked/error (such as NPE) or checked (which are not subclass of TextAnalyticsException) exception by wrapping them into TextAnalyticsException or its subclasses. Unchecked exception/Error occurred during compilation are returned as com.ibm.avatar.api.exceptions.FatalCompileError. Unchecked exception/Error occurred during creation of OperatorGraph, or while invoking any of the OperatorGraph method is returned as FatalRuntimeError.
        Parameters:
        cause - Root cause of this exception
        errorType - When this exception occurred (compile time, runtime, etc.)
        Returns:
        Rewrapped TextAnalyticsException exception object

      • findNonNullMsg

        public static String findNonNullMsg(Throwable t)
        Utility method to run through a series of chained exceptions and find a non-null error message string.
        Parameters:
        t - an exception, which may have a chain of other exceptions on its "cause" pointer
        Returns:
        the closest non-null error message to the root of the chain; if no error message is found, uses the exception classes in the chain as a message
